statements: SELECT * FROM PatientHealthData;
SELECT patient_name, age, weight FROM PatientHealthData;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, last_checkup_date FROM PatientHealthData;
SELECT * FROM PatientHealthData WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, potential_health_risks FROM PatientHealthData WHERE blood_pressure = 'High';
SELECT * FROM PatientHealthData WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT patient_name, weight, height FROM PatientHealthData WHERE blood_pressure LIKE '12%'
SELECT * FROM PatientHealthData WHERE last_checkup_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT patient_name, blood_pressure, potential_health_risks FROM PatientHealthData WHERE weight < 70 OR heart_rate > 80
SELECT patient_name, age, heart_rate FROM PatientHealthData ORDER BY age DESC, heart_rate ASC
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, age, diagnosis FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, name, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM HealthRisks WHERE risk_level = 'High';
SELECT patient_id, risk_factor, timestamp FROM HealthRisks ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, name FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE age < 50 AND diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' ORDER BY patient_id;
SELECT p.*, hr.risk_factor FROM Patients p JOIN HealthRisks hr ON p.patient_id = hr.patient_id WHERE hr.risk_level = 'High' ORDER BY p.name;

SELECT p.patient_id, p.name, hr.risk_factor, hr.timestamp FROM Patients p JOIN HealthRisks hr ON p.patient_id = hr.patient_id WHERE p.age BETWEEN 40 AND 60 AND hr.timestamp > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY hr.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE age > 20;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, condition_id, alert_message FROM alerts WHERE alert_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT condition_name, severity, description FROM health_conditions WHERE severity >= 3;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, condition_name, severity FROM patients JOIN health_conditions ON patients.patient_id = health_conditions.condition_id;
SELECT patient_name, alert_message, alert_timestamp FROM patients JOIN alerts ON patients.patient_id = alerts.patient_id WHERE alerts.alert_timestamp >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_alerts, DATE(alert_timestamp) AS alert_date FROM alerts GROUP BY DATE(alert_timestamp);
SELECT * FROM patient_data ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, gender FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT COUNT(patient_id), AVG(weight) FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30 GROUP BY gender;
SELECT patient_id, name, height FROM patient_data WHERE weight > 70 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT condition_name, diagnosis_date FROM health_conditions ORDER BY diagnosis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC, weight ASC;
SELECT name, age FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, age, height FROM patient_data WHERE weight > 70 AND height < 170 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM health_conditions WHERE condition_name LIKE '%diabetes%' AND treatment_plan IS NOT NULL ORDER BY diagnosis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM risk_factors WHERE risk_level = 'High' AND last_updated > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY risk_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, blood_type FROM patients WHERE blood_type = 'O';
SELECT * FROM health_records ORDER BY diagnosis DESC;
SELECT * FROM vital_signs WHERE heart_rate > 80 AND blood_pressure LIKE '%120%';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC, patient_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM health_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%infection%'
SELECT patient_name, blood_type FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT h.patient_id, r.diagnosis, v.heart_rate FROM health_records r JOIN vital_signs v ON r.patient_id = v.patient_id JOIN patients h ON h.patient_id = v.patient_id
SELECT p.patient_name, r.diagnosis, a.alert_message FROM patients p JOIN health_records r ON p.patient_id = r.patient_id JOIN alerts a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id ORDER BY r.diagnosis ASC
